mapper.sql: fUuid AS `uuid`, fRoleName AS `roleName`, fSequence AS `sequence`, fDescription AS `description`, fStatus AS `status`, fUpdateTime AS `updateTime`, fCreateTime AS `createTime`
mapper.select: SELECT fUuid AS "uuid" FROM t_role WHERE fRoleName = #{roleName}
SELECT e.fResourceID AS id FROM t_role r LEFT JOIN t_role_resource e ON r.fUuid = e.fRoleID WHERE r.fUuid = #{id}
SELECT e.fUuid AS id, rs.fUrl AS url FROM t_role r LEFT JOIN t_role_resource e ON r.fUuid = e.fRoleID LEFT JOIN t_resource rs ON e.fResourceID = rs.fUuid WHERE r.fUuid = #{id}
